original: <color=#FFE787>使用限制：</color><color=#ccffcc>進攻方可使用</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4896)@</color> 秒內我方士氣提升至全滿，並提升全體武將 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4896)@</color> 點武力和智力，且提升 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4896)@</color> 點移動速度。但強化狀態結束時在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4902)@</color> 秒內我方士氣歸零，並使全體武將  <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4902)@</color> 點武力和智力，且 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4902)@</color> 點移動速度。
text: <color=#FFE787>Restrictions on use: </color><color=#ccffcc>Available only on offense</color> in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4896)@</color> within seconds. Morale is increased to full, and all the generals will be promoted <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4896)@</color> point of strength and intelligence, and <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4896)@</color> point Moving speed. But at the end of the strengthening status, within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4902)@</color> seconds, our morale will return to zero, and all the generals will be made <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4902)@</color> Point of strength and intelligence, and <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4902)@</color> point of movement speed.
